G.</ls> {@--3@} Reddish. {@--4@} Shining, brilliant. {@--5@} Pure, clean, beautiful. --रः {@--1@} The white colour. {@--2@} The yellowish colour. {@--3@} The reddish colour. {@--4@} White mustard. {@--5@} The moon. {@--6@} A kind of buffalo. {@--7@} A kind of deer. {@--8@} The planet Jupiter. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of Chaitanya. --रं {@--1@} The filament of a lotus. {@--2@} Saffron. {@--3@} Gold.
